t: Galison - Puzzles, Games & Gifts - We bring art into everyday life
s: We bring art into everyday life by collaborating with known and emerging artists to create unique products for your enjoyment. Our jigsaw puzzles, games, stationery products, and distinctive gifts are admired for their quality and artistry!

Who are we? Founded in 1979, Galison is now a team of more than 30, based in New York City. In the beginning, we worked with museums to make select art imagery widely available in the form of smartly designed paper products. As the firm grew, so too did our product scope.
